Package ohos.agp.components.flex

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AlignContent
    Enumerates the alignment modes for all components in a multi-line FlexLayout along the cross axis.
    AlignItems
    Enumerates the alignment modes for all components in a single-line FlexLayout along the cross axis.
    AlignSelf
    Enumerates the alignment modes for a single component along the cross axis.
    FlexDirection
    Enumerates the directions for the main axis in the FlexLayout.
    FlexWrap
    Enumerates the flex wrap modes of the FlexLayout, which can be single-line or multi-line.
    JustifyContent
    Enumerates the alignment modes for all components along the main axis.
